name: POLARIUM (itch)
description:
An arcade musical game with magnetic particles!

CONTROLS:

Left CTRL Button:  GREEN CHARGE  (Alternative: Left Shift Button) 

Right CTRL Button:  RED CHARGE  (Alternative: Down Arrow Key)

HOW TO PLAY:

- GREEN CHARGE repels RED PARTICLES

- RED CHARGE repels GREEN PARTICLES

Repel the rotating particles through their correspondent ENERGY RING to DUPLICATE them.

If it goes through a different color ENERGY RING, the particle will be destroyed.

DUPLICATE or DESTROY particles to match a number between the values shown on screen under "TO POLARIZE".

When both RED and GREEN particles reach the desirable  number the level will be complete.
